Hello world, I am Tantely. Front-end Developer from Madagascar

About:

My name is Andrianarivola Tantely, I am a new web developer from Madagascar. Since I was a kid I have always been passionate about technology but I did not have the chance to use my passion because of my background. Fortunately, Onja was an open door for me, now I am living on my dream, I am keen on develoing especially for the web.

I have been learning Html5, css3, javascript, react, react hooks, Redux, typscript, git workflow, React-Native.

Services:

Front end development:

I like being front end developer. Front end development is implementing visual elements that users see and interact with a web application. A front end developer needs to be at least fluent at html, css and javascript other than css framework, javascript framework, version control and any other developer tools, and testing.
